name: yet-another-frontend-template
description: Get started fast with frontend development.
author: sinmineryt

scripts.start: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "HTTP,JS,LESS" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "yarn run http-server" "yarn run watch-js" "yarn run watch-styles"
scripts.watch-styles: yarn run build-styles-dev && chokidar "**/*.less" "./styles/**/*.css" -c "yarn run build-styles-dev"
scripts.build: yarn run build-js && yarn run build-styles
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify ./scripts/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -t envify -o ./bundle.js && yarn run minify-js
scripts.build-styles: yarn run build-less && yarn run postcss && yarn run minify-css
scripts.build-styles-dev: yarn run build-less && yarn run postcss && echo "Styles built!"
